sn14.14:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, it is by way of elements that beings come together and unite. Those of an inferior disposition come together and unite with those of an inferior disposition; those of a good disposition come together and unite with those of a good disposition.[n.242] The contrast is betweenhinādhimuttikāandkalyāṇādhimuttikā.Spkglossesadhimuttikāwithajjhāsaya,"inclination."
sn14.14:2: In the past, by way of elements, beings came together and united … .
sn14.14:3: In the future, too, by way of elements, beings will come together and unite … .sn.ii.155
sn14.14:4: Now too, at present, by way of elements, beings come together and unite. Those of an inferior disposition come together and unite with those of an inferior disposition; those of a good disposition come together and unite with those of a good disposition."
